Meaning: start time of recId; seconds since recorder on
end time of recId; seconds since recorder on

recording number, consecutively counts up from 1 each time the recorder is turned on. In files with multiple Recordings, the DLP/recorder was turned off and on again multiple times within the single ITS file.

midnight epoch seconds from 1970-1-1 00:00:00 on day recorder was first turned on
start time of recId in seconds from midnight on day recorder was first turned on
end time of recId in seconds from midnight on day recorder was first turned on
end time of recId; Time since recorder was first turned on (easy to compare to WAV files)
seconds & centiseconds duration of this recId
